name: The Scourge
description:
Important! I haven't managed to get zooming working properly in WebGL (at least in Firefox). For the best experience, run at 1920x1080 using the downloadable Windows version.

The Scourge is an RTS with rogue-like elements. Build structures and train units, defeating enemies on your way down to the lower levels of the dungeon.

Currently, most of the rogue like elements are not in the game, however this is planned for future releases.
